product_name: Hi-Tec Sienna Strap Sandals - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Flirty and feminine with a durable outsole to handle more adventurous outings, the Hi-Tec Sienna Strap Sandals let you wander the shoreline or the farmers' market in style and comfort. Strappy leather uppers provide comfortable, flexible structure; ankle strap with rip-and-stick closure delivers a snug, secure fit. EVA footbeds and midsoles provide all-day cushioning and support. Durable rubber outsoles deliver reliable traction on a variety of surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: Flirty and feminine with a durable outsole to handle more adventurous outings, the Hi-Tec Sienna Strap Sandals let you wander the shoreline or the farmers' market in style and comfort.
